FuncDef: This command enables hello authentication at either the interface or level context. Both the hello authentication key and the hello authentication type on a segment must match. The helloauthentication-keystatement must also be included.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies simple password (plain text) authentication is required.
Specifies MD5 authentication in accordance with RFC2104 (HMAC: Keyed-Hashing for Message Authentication) is required.

ExtraInfo: Default: no hello-authentication-type - hello authentication is disabled
